subject: Re: END OF YEAR SPECIAL
preview: Thanks Joel, appreciate the quick turn around on this one. All is working as it should now 😊  Kind Regards,  Brooke Wilkinson  BROOKE WILKINSON  BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER    E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYAND

Thanks Joel, appreciate the quick turn around on this one. All is working as it should now 😊

Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER



E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Brooke,

Confirming we have updated the cart page and the "Free weeks stuff". Please see the attached.

Hi Joel,

Thank you for updating the wording, however it is important that the cart does not show 4 weeks free. This is something we add manually at our end behind the scenes. It should never been shown in the cart calculations (as it currently does in the below screenshot). It should just have the standard 2 weeks free as per normal. Just in case someone puts through an order for an 8 week hire in Jan (when our special promotion has ended), we do not want them receiving 4 weeks free. Just the standard 2 weeks free would apply to them.



Also, we are a little concerned the message in the cart about the special promotion does not stand out enough. Is there a way to have that any clearer/more obvious?

Thanks so much.

Kind Regards,

BROOKE WILKINSON
BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER



E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU
P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU
Added task and time to spreadsheet

Hi Brooke,

Sure, we have updated the menu text and the cart text.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Thanks guys, this is great but can we please change wording. Amy and I have discussed, and we are worried 2022 is a bit misleading and we would like to be more specific.

Can the cart message please say: Pay 4 weeks to automatically receive 4 weeks free for all deliveries in Nov and Dec 2022.

Can the image overlay on the Products menu please say: PAY 4 WEEKS AND RECEIVE 4 WEEKS FREE for Nov and Dec 2022 deliveries.

Thanks so much!

Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER



E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Brooke,

We have made some updates to the site. Please see the attached.

HI Heath,

Where is it meant to appear? I just did a test RFP order and I didn't see anything about us applying 4 free weeks to the order anywhere??? I will try again. Perhaps if I know where to look out for this, it might help. But nothing super obvious appeared.

Also, when you hover over products (as a retail user), it is still saying 2 weeks free. Should we change this to 4 weeks free and then a smaller by line font to say 'For all 2022 deliveries'.



Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER



E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Brooke, 

As discussed, we have applies this to the RFP (public) site only. Can you please take it for a spin and let me know if this is what you were after?

My apologies, we do not require anything changed on the PDF paperwork - we appreciate there is complexity to that.

We just want a note to appear at checkout to say "If you pay for 4 weeks, you will automatically receive 4 weeks free if your delivery occurs in 2022". But if we can have this across both platforms that would be great!

Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER



E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Yes please, both portals would be great so that everyone's paperwork reflects the amount of free weeks applied. The promotion only applies to deliveries that take place in 2022. So if you could please schedule this to revert back to normal on our closure date Wednesday 21st December.

Thanks so much.

Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER



E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Brooke, 

We are working on this now and assuming that this change needs to happen automatically in the stylist's portal as well as the public site. Is this correct?

Further to my email below, can we please have a note at checkout stage that 4 weeks free will automatically be applied for deliveries taking place in 2022.



Thanks so much!



Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson



BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER

Hi There,



Regarding my email below from Wednesday, can we please get this one actioned urgently as Alban has geared our Google Ad words around this 4 WEEKS FREE end of year offer, but when people click through to our website it is still saying 2 weeks free so there is inconsistent messaging there.



Thanks so much.



Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi There,


Can we please have the PAY 4 WEEKS RECEIVE 2 WEEKS FREE pop up on our website home page changed to:


END OF YEAR SPECIAL
PAY 4 WEEKS RECEIVE 4 WEEKS FREE


Can we please make this fairly bold so it stands out.


And then can we please have you diarise to revert this back to the standard PAY 4 WEEKS RECEIVE 2 WEEKS FREE on Wednesday 21st December.


Thanking you!


Kind Regards,
Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER
